member.summary: The AlignBottom command enables you to align all selected objects along the bottom surface of the reference object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.AlignTop
member.summary: The AlignTop command enables you to align all selected objects along the top surface of the reference object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.AlignLeft
member.summary: The AlignLeft command enables you to align all selected objects along the left corner of the reference object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.AlignCenter
member.summary: The AlignCenter command enables you to center all selected objects vertically. It aligns selected objects to the center with respect to the horizontal axis by changing the x-coordinate of the object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.AlignRight
member.summary: The AlignRight command enables you to align all selected objects along the right corner of the reference object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.AlignMiddle
member.summary: The AlignMiddle command enables you to center all selected objects horizontally. It aligns selected objects to the center with respect to the vertical axis by changing the y-coordinate of the object.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.SpaceAcross
member.summary: The SpaceAcross equally spaces the selected nodes horizontally

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.SpaceDown
member.summary: The SpaceDown equally spaces the selected nodes vertically

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.SendToBack
member.summary: The SendToBack command visually moves the selected elements behind all the other overlapped elements.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.SendBackward
member.summary: The SendBackward command visually moves the selected elements behind the underlying element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.BringToFront
member.summary: The BringToFront command visually brings the selected element to the front over all other overlapped elements.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.BringForward
member.summary: The BringForward command visually moves the selected element over the nearest overlapping element.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.MoveDown
member.summary: The MoveDown command moves the selected object towards the bottom by 1 pixel.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.MoveUp
member.summary: The MoveUp command moves the selected object towards the top by 1 pixel.

member.summary: The MoveLeft command moves the selected object towards the left by 1 pixel.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DiagramCommands.MoveRight
member.summary: The MoveRight command moves the selected object towards the right by 1 pixel.

member.summary: Grouping commands are used to group/ungroup the selected elements on the diagram.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DummyConstants.UnGroup
member.summary: Grouping commands are used to group/ungroup the selected elements on the diagram.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DummyConstants.SameSize
member.summary: Object size commands enable selected Diagram objects on the page to be resized. The selected objects are resized in proportion to the first object in the selection list.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DummyConstants.SameHeight
member.summary: Object size commands enable selected Diagram objects on the page to be resized. The selected objects are resized in proportion to the first object in the selection list.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DummyConstants.SameWidth
member.summary: Object size commands enable selected Diagram objects on the page to be resized. The selected objects are resized in proportion to the first object in the selection list.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DummyConstants.AlignBottom
member.summary: The AlignBottom command enables you to align all selected objects along the bottom surface of the reference object.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DummyConstants.AlignTop
member.summary: The AlignTop command enables you to align all selected objects along the top surface of the reference object.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DummyConstants.AlignLeft
member.summary: The AlignLeft command enables you to align all selected objects along the left corner of the reference object.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DummyConstants.AlignCenter
member.summary: The AlignCenter command enables you to center all selected objects vertically. It aligns selected objects to the center with respect to the horizontal axis by changing the x-coordinate of the object.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DummyConstants.AlignRight
member.summary: The AlignRight command enables you to align all selected objects along the right corner of the reference object.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DummyConstants.AlignMiddle
member.summary: The AlignMiddle command enables you to center all selected objects horizontally. It aligns selected objects to the center with respect to the vertical axis by changing the y-coordinate of the object.

member.summary: The SpaceDown equally spaces the selected nodes vertically

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Diagram.DummyConstants.BringForward
